html.p: Data Collection: The pan:system, pan:threat, and pan:traffic sourcetypes are necessary to collect firewall data via the Palo Alto Networks Add-on for Splunk.

search.query: `cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:threat" | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_palo` sourcetype=\"pan:threat\"" | append [| search `cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:traffic" | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_palo` sourcetype=\"pan:traffic\""] | table label, data

format.colorPalette: {"Data Present": #008000, "Data Not Present": #B83C08, "Report is enabled": #008000, "Report is disabled": #B83C08}

search.query: `cs_palo` sourcetype!="pan:log" sourcetype!="pan:globalprotect" | stats count as Event_Count, values(dvc_name) as dvc_name, values(sourcetype) as sourcetype by host | append [| tstats `cs_summariesonly_authentication` count as VPN from datamodel=Cyences_Authentication where Authentication.dest_category="vpn_auth" AND `cs_palo` by host] | stats values(dvc_name) as dvc_name, values(sourcetype) as sourcetype, sum(*) as * by host | eval VPN=if(VPN>0,"Global Protect Present", "Global Protect Absent") | fields - Event_Count | sort - VPN

`cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:system" signature="auth-fail" | rex "failed authentication for user \'(?<user>.*)\'\." | rex " From: (?<src>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | stats count values(dvc) as dvc, values(dvc_name) as dvc_name, values(src) as src by user | sort - count | `cs_palo_firewall_login_failure_filter`

html.p: Description: Palo Alto firewall login failures by local and Local_Users profiles.
Data Collection: : The pan:system sourcetype for Palo Alto is used to collect data via the Palo Alto Networks Add-on for Splunk.

search.query: `cs_palo` sourcetype IN ("pan:threat", "pan:system") | dedup dvc | eval dvc_n=dvc." (".dvc_name.")"
`cs_palo` sourcetype IN ("pan:system", "pan:threat") | fields log_subtype | dedup log_subtype | table log_subtype

`cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:threat" $tkn_threat_severity$ dvc=$tkn_threat_palo_device|s$ $tkn_threat_logsubtype$ $tkn_threat_search|s$ | table dvc, dvc_name, _time, log_subtype, severity, threat_category, threat, action, app, user, src, src_port, src_location, src_zone, dest, dest_port, dest_translated_ip, dest_translated_port, url, serial_number, session_id

`cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:system" $tkn_threat_severity$ dvc=$tkn_threat_palo_device|s$ $tkn_threat_logsubtype$ $tkn_threat_search|s$ NOT "license for" | table dvc, dvc_name, _time, log_subtype, severity, description, signature, action, user, src, serial_number
`cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:system" "license for" | table dvc, dvc_name, _time, log_subtype, severity, description, signature, action, user, src, serial_number
